website_summaries.verdict: While this play tunnel is fairly basic, it still provides a lot of fun for little ones without taking up much space or costing a lot of money.
pros: Sports a singular tube design that takes very little time and effort to unfold for use, and collapse for storage
Comes at an inexpensive price point
A few customers brag about its usefulness for dog agility exercises
cons: Fabric has been known to wear off the frame, causing wires to be exposed
Some parents suggest tape if this happens
Has fewer components than others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Love for dog agility!
customer_reviews.text: I got this tunnel for my dogs to use. We do not take agility training seriously, it is just for fun. I was worried the material would rip under their nails but so far it has not been an issue! My 55lb boxer is a little tall for the tunnel, but he crouches through it without any problem. It is also a quiet material so it does not make too much noise when we are playing. I love that it can be stored easily with its own ties!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A.

customer_reviews.title: exposing a large wire that could easily injure my child
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product a few months ago and my two year old daughter used it only a few times. Yesterday I noticed that a seam was ripped, exposing a large wire that could easily injure my child. See the pictures attached. Amazon will no longer allow me to return this product. I will have to throw it away and consider the money wasted. If you do purchase this tunnel, please ensure that you check it frequently for damage and exposed wires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: “Junior Thunder Dome”
customer_reviews.text: Wanna turn your baby into a hamster or ferret? This is step one. Wanna keep your twins fighting for the right to use the tunnel while being able to remove and fold up the now named “thunder tunnel” where two babies enter and both stay in there crying because they can’t figure out how to get past their sister/brother or one sits in the tunnel while the other beats on it with everything from their fist to they heaviest object a one year old can muster the anger and frustration to lift? Then this is for you! All the blood, drool, leaky diaper or spit up cleans up nicely and it folds completely flat to be out the way.
customer_reviews.author: Alton D Gammon III

customer_reviews.title: After my toddler using it rather sporadically (and not even ...
customer_reviews.text: After my toddler using it rather sporadically (and not even roughing it up too much), one of the metal wires tore through the end of the one of the openings. Luckily a friend pointed it out really quickly so I was able to pick it up and throw it away before it seriously gouged my little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hammerschlag

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs as well as kids.  A bargain
customer_reviews.text: Terrific value! Beat the heck out of paying for an official dog agility tunnel. Bought it for my dogs both for fun and agility training. At first they were skittish when it moved as they walked through. Solved problem by positioning support on either side which prevented rolling. Now, they are fine and having fun with it. About 19 inches in diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Trekkery

customer_reviews.title: Easy fold and hasn't torn
customer_reviews.text: My kids are testing the very limits of this tunnel. It has been bent, stretched, and used as a climbing tunnel between couches. It has held up. Which is super impressive with how thin the fabric is. Honestly the fact it hasn't ripped is the biggest plus for it. It folds easily and doesn't take up much space. Perfect to pull out for some days and then put back away.
customer_reviews.author: Auburn

customer_reviews.title: Tube has sharp exposed metal, not safe
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks of use of our 11 month old crawling through the tunnel, the sharp metal edge ripped through and would not go back inside the nylon. This is not a child friendly toy.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Sams

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler grandson and he can't even get near it- his older brother and sister are always in it! Colorful, easy to store and sturdy enough for what it is. I like the fact that we can "add" other things to it to make a fun afternoon- we put up a teppee on one end and a play tent on the other and the kids had run going back and forth
customer_reviews.author: D. maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Good for Small Dog Agility
customer_reviews.text: I used this tunnel to introduce tunnels to my puppy who I am training to do agility work. If you are using it for that purpose, I would recommend measuring your dog to make sure it is a good fit. My dog will quickly outgrow it and could easily tear it apart if I let her. However, for the purpose we use it for it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Broke easily.
customer_reviews.text: Metal ring started sticking out and is not fixable. Started to break less than six months after getting as a gift. I wish it were more durable because my son loved playing with this tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: This tunnel was purchased to replace one from IKEA that tore after 10+ years of use by children, small dogs and a mini pig. This tunnel didn't even make it 2 weeks. The fabric is thin, tears easy and stitching separates from the metal coil.
customer_reviews.author: BoostMe97

customer_reviews.title: Even the dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this item so much. My silly chocolate lab is also a huge fan. Whenever we have it out and open, she makes sure to run through it and sometimes laying in the tunnel playing with her toy. Her nails have never ripped the tunnel or anything. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lauren johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this is a gift for my nephew almost a year ago & he loves it, still has it with no holes or rips
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Davis

customer_reviews.title: Puppys load of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 8 week old Springer puppy ... he has gotten hours of play from this and it’s still holding up after 2 months of sharp puppy teeth. He plays with it open, half open & even closed.
customer_reviews.author: damsel

customer_reviews.title: Thin, Cheap, very bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: Yes, My kid likes it. BUT.......this tunnel is sooo cheaply made, one of the ties already tore off. My kid is also a pretty ruff player so i dont see this lasting very long. The fabric is very very thin and the sewing is off. Not worth $20, kinda wish i just paid a littlw more for a better quality one.
customer_reviews.author: nebulaecho

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with, easy to store
customer_reviews.text: The one-year-old for whom this was gifted loved it, as did his older siblings. A simple toy with lots of fun and has held up well to use. Also great because it completely folds up and can be stored behind the couch. The only issue is that the ties to hold it in storage are very short and hard to use, but that was not enough of a problem to even take away one star.
customer_reviews.author: LaLuther

customer_reviews.title: POCO DIVO 6-ft Play Tunne
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my one year old grandson for part of his Christmas. He crawls in and out and has a good time if his grandmother sits and cheers him on. The tunnel is colorful, easy to fold up, and pops right open for play.
customer_reviews.author: Liddybun

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous for kids
customer_reviews.text: Broke after three uses, dangerous wife poking out at baby eye level... get he Melissa and Doug one instead
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun tunnel
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this tunnel, on and off. It’s worth it though for the times he does love playing in it and chasing me or the dog through it. It folds up easily and doesn’t take up much room when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieTop Contributor: Philosophy

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: The kids have dragged, jumped, stomped on, buried under cushions/pillows, pulled and not a single tear or bend. This thing a staple in the play area and if we have visitors we can fold it and tie it with the attached ribbons and tuck it away.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Jay

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren loved this tunnel! Hours of fun inside & outside! Easy to fold up! Highly recommend for the hours to pass by! My grandchildren are 2-5 yo!
customer_reviews.author: Mimyam

customer_reviews.title: Not well designed. A chain to a cover would have been better.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the cover as it has no chain which makes super difficult to put the tunnel in. Plus the wire actually hurts. My baby got the mark when she accidentally fell on it. It's bad.
customer_reviews.author: Zoya

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughters love to crawl through this tunnel. It's a lot of fun and collapses completely so it is easy to store. The perfect special toy for Grandma's house.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my puppies..they loved it..yes they trashed it eventually but not much survives a litter of puppies! Well worth the money for the amount of enjoyment they got!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Bybee

customer_reviews.title: Works well, not super durable
customer_reviews.text: I like how light and easy to deal with it is. It’s hits its purpose of a colorful fabric tube for littles to crawl through. For the price it is well worth it, but the fabric did start to wear down fairly quickly especially around the internal wires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK- but not as sturdy as they used to be made
customer_reviews.text: These things used to be built a lot stronger when I was a child. This is flimsy- in comparison. But my children love playing in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it. She just laughs and laughs. If she is fast enough she can hide in it. So much fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Kopek - Minnick

customer_reviews.title: What you’d expect
customer_reviews.text: It’s what i expected. The only downfall is the metal in the spiral is very uncomfortable because the material is so thin but of course as a child, they don’t care much & a blanket inside would work as an easy fix
customer_reviews.author: John Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Wires poke out
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this product not even a week and one of the wires poked out so therefore it's not safe to be played with anymore
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Great for busy toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it! Easy to set-up and put away. I would suggest adding a couple a stitches to the ties if you take-down dailey.
customer_reviews.author: The Ducketts

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Very thin tunnel.... not strong enough. When my kids go inside the tunnel doesn’t stay at its place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for TinyWhoop Racing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be an obstacle for TinyWhoop racing. It is perfect. folds up small, great little obstacle.
customer_reviews.author: seahorse

customer_reviews.title: decent for price, metal poked through though
customer_reviews.text: decent, but the ends need sturdier fabric to hold the metal wire. The twisted wire popped through the fabric on one end which is a hazard to children playing with it. I have tape on it now and will sow a patch of thicker fabric over it.
customer_reviews.author: B Daniel

customer_reviews.title: This tunnel is so easy to set up and store--just collapse and tie the ...
customer_reviews.text: This tunnel is so easy to set up and store--just collapse and tie the two sides down and slip it into the bag to store it and untie them and drop it on the floor to expand to set it up. My 15-month-old daughter absolutely loves crawling through it over and over and over again. I can even fit through by doing a little soldier crawl and my daughter thinks that's just hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun, fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren love it. I haven't seen them for a couple of weeks so have no idea if it remains intact but they went crazy in the thing. I hadn't laughed like I did while watching them for a good while. It's a nice size- both circumference and length- for them to play in, crawl through, and generally have fun. I would certainly purchase another for them.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Cute tunnel
customer_reviews.text: Alittle thin material....carry bag should have zipper,. Tricky to put tunnel back in and then tie bag...
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Meade

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this. Had it less than a month and inner wire broke loose from the connector and ripped through the fabric. Tried sliding it back in and reconnecting it, lasted maybe another week and came apart again and ripped another hole. Going to attempt the duct tape fix since it's listed as non returnable at this point
customer_reviews.author: AFCoug905

customer_reviews.title: Imagination Provoking and Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 1/2 and 1 1/2 year old grandkids had a ball with this tunnel. They climbed through it, hid in it, used it as a slide for stuffed animals (one end up on the couch), and played "bunny and chipmunk" for hours on end. Very cost efficient entertainment! Thankfully, we had no issues with tearing or exposed wires as some reviewers have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Maz-n-blu

customer_reviews.title: flimsy junk
customer_reviews.text: Do not bother buying this model. Tunnel is very flimsy and looks ready to rip. It is so cheap it moves all over the place when toddler crawl through. will be donated since I cannot return. Better off buying IKEA tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: Baby & Cat Both Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 9-month-old and she loves crawling through it. Turns out my lazy fat cat also enjoys it. I was surprised that cat likes it considering he ignores most of baby's toys. It's fun watching the baby crawl in one end and the cat run out the other. Also, the manufacturer recommends ages 2+, but I haven't noticed anything about this that makes it unsafe for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 month old Is obsessed. Easy to pack back up. Cats love it too
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Gagne

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old child liked it and played with it for a few times ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 year old child liked it and played with it for a few times until wires started poking out of it. Tried sewing the wire back in a few times but wire would always break out somewhere else. So, we didn't want him to get hurt or poked in the eye we had to throw it out. This thing is hazardous to children and would not recommend wasting your money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L. Vittitoe

customer_reviews.title: Move over humans
customer_reviews.text: I put this tunnel to the test years ago against a fuzzy bottom apex predator. 3 years later the tunnel still stands although has some wear. So I ordered another to give the four paw, claw and teeth another go around with the new one. Also I can fit inside and hide from the world. Great tunnels.
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for little ones
customer_reviews.text: I received this product within 2 days of ordering. My almost 1yo absolutely loves this tunnel! Her two older sisters (5 & 6) also love to play in this with her. So far it's durability has stood up to 3 cats and 3 energetic girls. No major tears or holes (any holes are from kitty nails and are in no way related to the quality of this product). I would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandson loves playing in the tunnel. Not only crawling through it, since it's springing, he'll get in the center with a little help holding it down and he "disappears" when it comes back up. So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for play room!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great, inexpensive addition to our daughters play area. We bought this when our daughter was eight months old and crawling. She's now almost 15 months and I can see her enjoying it for a few more years. Our 7 year old son enjoys playing with it as well. It is made of a very thin nylon material and quality construction. The tunnel easily collapses for storage/transport and is secured with ties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor/outdoor fun!
customer_reviews.text: With all the rain we’re having I thought this would be fun to have in the house! It is, the little guys I take care of love crawling through it and it’s easy to take out and put away. Our cairn terrier loves going through it too! I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Murph

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: My little crawler loves going back and forth through this tunnel. From the first moment I opened it it's been a hit. Other reviewers warned about how hard the metal in it is and i agree. I keep checking it to make sure it isn't poking through. After reading other reviews before I bought it I don't think it will last a long time but I wanted to get a tunnel that wasn't too expensive for now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons birthday. One year old. Daughter in law loves the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Great for my occupational therapy job
customer_reviews.text: Meets the job as a fun sensory activity. I would say that it fits up to an 8-year old child.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Fun time
customer_reviews.text: Kids had one & enjoyed Bought one for our grands They Love it 💕
customer_reviews.author: D. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is kind of flimsy, and for the way my kids play with this, the metal frame was coming through the fabric within a couple of weeks. Nothing a little duct tape couldn’t fix.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Webb

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Light, thin, pops up if you don't tie it together when folded. Good size for up to 4 yrs old maybe a short 5 yr old. Has carrying case. Overall a good deal. Toddlers love this.
customer_reviews.author: Justthe2ofus

customer_reviews.title: Rabbit time
customer_reviews.text: This the second one I purchased. I ordered again because I'm very satisfied with the quality and durability. My two rabbits love laying next to each other in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Metal wire pokes through.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this product; but it has a huge flaw. This is incredibly flimsy, and the tunnel support is metal wiring. This pierces the material and you are left with a tunnel that most likely will poke your child someplace. I will be returning and spending more for one that is thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Trev086

customer_reviews.title: Our Shih Tzu Magnolia LOVES this tunnel!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tunnel for our new puppy and she absolutely loves it! We have a blast watching her run continuously through it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up to kids and a dog for more than a month of play.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material with good wire. Doesn’t hold up well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Short

customer_reviews.title: Fun for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: The grandchildren love it. Simple, easy to store and easy to bring anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Noble

customer_reviews.title: Fun product.
customer_reviews.text: Not my idea for a gift but my grandkids love it.
customer_reviews.author: smithreviews

customer_reviews.title: Great pop up toy at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Item pops up on its own perfectly. Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: A must have toy for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Best toy ever! My 2 11 month old grandsons play in it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J. smith

customer_reviews.title: My kid looovees it! I do wish it was ...
customer_reviews.text: My kid looovees it! I do wish it was bigger in diameter. The size is listed on the product do I knew what I was getting. Material is thin and no cushion around the wire to protect knees when crawling on it but my kid doesn't seem to mind and the material hadn't ripped yet.
customer_reviews.author: McCail Merrival

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for kids and cats.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our grand kids. They love it. So do our cats! Great pounce cave! It does make noise, not much when played in, adds to the experience! Seems to be durable, we will see, two weeks so far just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: good rain jacket material. not what i hoped  for. wont last with pre-schoolers
customer_reviews.text: good rain jacket material. not what i hoped for. wont last with pre-schoolers. case doesn't have a zipper closure, it ties.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Fox

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! Very easy yo collapse and tuck away.
customer_reviews.author: Randi V.

customer_reviews.title: Dog agility
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it for dog agility for my two small dogs. It's been great.
customer_reviews.author: B. Van Handel

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.  slightly disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift and thought it was the exact same as one we had at home. To hold in the collapse position you have to tie strings together. Velcro is so much easier. The fabric is a little thinner than expected too. Good for the price but I have a better quality tunnel. Ours was a gift so I am not sure of the price difference between the two.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it ! I really like that it’s easy to unfold and fold back up . I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Too small, kids up to max 35lbs can probably ...
customer_reviews.text: Too small, kids up to max 35lbs can probably crawl through this on their stomach and a 2 years old could not sit up right inside.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a few days, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This was great for a few days, my kids loved it, but in less than a week the wire broke through the fabric and now it is not safe to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product was nice at first
customer_reviews.text: This product was nice at first, my daughter loved it, but after a few uses the wire started poking out and became a safety hazard so I had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Fouts

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Has tiny little holes where the wire is sewn into
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 1 or 2 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this and when they’re not using it I can fold it up and put it away. I bought this for my 1 year old for her birthday and she LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the kids
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present for my niece and she LOVED it. It's the perfect toy for a toddler that loves huts and tunnels :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat cave
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my cats to play with. I had a cat tunnel and it was too small. We keep one side tied together and it is a half circle cave
customer_reviews.author: Dave C.

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. It's thin material that is see through but so far so good with a toddler as well as dogs crawling through the tunnel. I wish the strings to tie the tunnel to go into the bag were a touch longer, but, all in all, very pleased. Nice and lightweight and portable with the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Roberts

customer_reviews.title: A good "go-to" backyard toy.
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, it's held up over a few uses for me but I can see it easily getting ripped with some rougher use. It folds up quickly and easily and can easily be hung up on a nail in the garage or slipped under a shelf. Great for a quick "Aw crap, I need some toys out there" item.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I go this for my hyper puppy. He loved it and it still holds up to his “abuse”
customer_reviews.author: SANDY

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my Jack Russell mix entertained. He learned how to go through in minutes. I pick it up and only bring it out every few days so it doesn't lose the fun factor. Great low-cost way to keep dogs with active minds busy.
customer_reviews.author: Stasia A Fluckey

customer_reviews.title: Is what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Kids aren’t very fond of it it is kind of awkward to store unless you put it up and forget about it.. but it is what it says and I’m sure somebodies kids would love it more than mine!
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: A tunnel of joy and adventure for a little boy!
customer_reviews.text: For my sweet nephew! From the photos it was a big hit. Durable? Not sure, but at this price and at three years old, who really cares.
customer_reviews.author: PaintswithWords

customer_reviews.title: Great tunnel at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. Great quality. Got this for our German Shepherd puppy & agility training. It is plenty thick enough for her nails to not go through the material. Comes with its own little storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: House of McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves to play with the tunnel! Good material, haven’t had any problems with it, we’ve had it for about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: AdyH

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s super thin but it’s amazing! Hasn’t broke yet toddler boy!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! It greatly motivated my toddler son to learn ...
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! It greatly motivated my toddler son to learn to walk and as a baby to crawl. EASILY folds up (which many pop-up tents or tunnels do not) and is so easy to store. We don't have lots of space, but it doesn't matter. It pops open in seconds and can be put away in under a minute. Even the cats enjoy this tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Kids and puppies love it.
customer_reviews.text: Kids and puppies love it. Thankfully, I don't have to throw a treat in there for the kids to use it. The puppy took a lot more convincing.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Red

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was scared at first but now she loves it
customer_reviews.author: alexa

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy. But my kids still have lots of fun with it.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Kinda flimsy. But you get what you pay for. The wire poked out within a week. I had to work it back in and sew it up. The wire was NOT sharp though. Had a well rounded edge thank goodness.
customer_reviews.author: Tears Heal

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it they run through it they like to lay in it they play with it and in it great for full grown cats
customer_reviews.author: criso

customer_reviews.title: Tunnel of fun.
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old grandson is enjoying crawling through this brightly colored tunnel! It is easy to unfold and fold. You can take it anywhere...indoors and outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Paz

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My child used this tunnel only a couple of times then the wire in the end popped out and cut his arm. I am unable to return this item and can't get any response from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a tunnel, it works
customer_reviews.text: Baby went on one side and came out the other side. I feel like this is a success.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My autistic son loves this thing! Very happy and has a good quality. Easy to set up and put away!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product today for my 1.5 year old. He LOVES IT!! Good quality as well. Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Eilish Peloquin

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Sharp metal wire was sticking out after 1 hour of our toddler playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Harder

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. I thought it would bring some type of slit to be able to use it outside/ground. But not bad.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and folds up into nothing
customer_reviews.text: My niece (9 mos) loses her mind over this simple little tunnel. Great quality and folds up into nothing. The perfect toy.
customer_reviews.author: Danny C

customer_reviews.title: Folds away nicely.
customer_reviews.text: I like having the case to fold it into. With the two sets of ties, it's easy to fold it back down and put it away. The size is nice for kids. Not a good choice if an adult plans on crawling through it. The colors are bright and the kids enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittony M.

customer_reviews.title: Did not seem like it would hold up over much use
customer_reviews.text: very thin nylon. Did not seem like it would hold up over much use.
customer_reviews.author: einstein

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to open and close this tunnel
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to open and close this tunnel, easy to store and great fun to play with. You can use it as part of an obstacle course or roll balls back-and-forth through it or just crawl through it! I would recommend this tunnel for small size children probably under three years old because the diameter of the tunnel is not that big
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: POCO DIVO 6-ft Play Tunnel Kids Tent Children Pop-up Toy Tube
product_meta.description:
6 feet Kids Tunnel Children Color Tube Toy Tent 

This 6 feet play tunnel is an adorable gift for all kids. The color tube is perfect for muscle development, stimulate the imagination for creative playtime. Consist of blue, yellow & red is the most popular multi-color tunnel. Fast and easy set up/breakdown with no tools required. The lightweight tent with a carry bag is great for indoor or outdoor use. The playtent can be folded flat for convenient storage when it is not in use. 

- Perfect for muscle development, stimulate the imagination for creative playtime 
- Consist of blue, yellow & red is the most popular multi-color tunnel 
- Ideal for home, backyard, parks, parties, day care and more 
- Lightweight and portable with a zipper carry bag 
- Easy to clean by damp cloth and mild soap 
- Pop up tube design 
- Fast and easy set up/breakdown with no tools required 
- Tent folds flat for convenient storage when not in use 
- Material: 100% Polyester fabric & spring metal frame 
- Tube Tent Dimension in inch: 19” (Diameter) x 71” (L) 
- Tube Tent Dimension in cm: 47cm(Diameter) x 180cm(L)
